data.title: Movement System Impairment Syndromes Courses
data.meta_description: Our Movement System Impairment Syndromes (MSI) courses offer the opportunity to learn how to properly identify and treat impairments of the movement system.
data.text:
Movement System Syndromes Courses

Our Movement System Syndromes courses offer the opportunity to learn how to properly observe, identify, and treat the cause of the musculoskeletal pain problems.

Overview

The Movement System Syndromes were developed by Shirley Sahrmann, PT, PhD and her colleagues. These syndromes are described in her books, Diagnosis and Treatment of Movement Impairment Syndromes and Movement System Impairment Syndromes of the Extremities, Cervical and Thoracic Spine.

Our Movement System Syndromes courses teach you to identify faulty alignment, movement patterns, and muscle imbalances using observation of movement as well as muscle length and performance testing. You will also learn how to alleviate and prevent mechanical musculoskeletal pain through treatment focused on the restoration of optimal alignment and appropriate movement patterns.

Nexus Motion provide a certificate of completion that includes contact hours approved by California Physical Therapy Association, which has one of the most strict CEU approvals. Course participants will need to check their own state board’s requirement for acceptance of the course to fulfill licensure renewal CEUs. If the participant requires additional documentation to meet their state board licensure requirements, an additional administration fee will be assessed.

Request additional information about our Movement System Syndromes courses

Visit our calendar to find out about Movement System Syndromes courses all over the world

July 18, 2023

Evidence for Movement System Impairment concepts with Dr. Shirley Sahrmann

6:00PM Central

1.5 Hour Webinar

Evidence for Movement System Impairment

1.5 hour Zoom webinar with Dr. Shirley Sahrmann

MSI concepts are one of the most evidence based principles! Dr. Sahrmann will simplify the evidence for you so you can be confident that what you do in the clinic is really effective.

You will have a 2-week recording access if you cannot join us live.

Register for July webinar only

1.5 Hour Webinar

Lumbar MSI case study #1

1.5 hour Zoom webinar with Dr. Nancy Bloom & Dr. Shirley Sahrmann
